name: Archery Combat
description:
Note: Due to limitation on uploading size, I'm not uploading the map and only basic terrain is there (you can see in last screen shot).

This project is for educational purpose only. Not going to use it for any commercial purposes.

Created that project to test my programming skill and learn the new things in Unreal Engine 4. I really enjoyed creating the system and game mechanics of that project. I'm trying to implement some basic mission system in this project which is always wanted to do.
